the death of kurt cobain marred my middle school years.

I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work.
My worst nightmare is being fired from my internship.

content.text: Hello, how are you today?
Good, how about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm a bit down because my boyfriend broke up with me recently, but I'm excited to start my day.
I'm sorry to hear that, breakups are never easy. But it's good to hear that you're still excited to start your day.
Thanks, it means a lot. I'm trying to stay positive.
That's the best thing you can do. I'm sure you'll get through this.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
No problem. So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a graphic designer.
Oh, that's cool. I've always been interested in graphic design.
It's a lot of fun. I love creating things with my computer.
That's awesome. I'm more of a hands-on person, so I like working with my hands.
I can understand that. I like working with my hands too, but I also love creating things with my computer.
Yeah, I can see the appeal. So, what are your favorite things to do in your free time?
I like to listen to music, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
Oh, that's cool. I like to do a lot of the same things.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Yeah, we do. It's nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
Me too. It's nice to have someone to talk to.
Yeah, it is
